name: Legend of the Trials
description:
Legend of the Trials is a dungeon crawler inspired by the original Legend of Zelda NES title. As legend had prophesized, shortly after waking up in the town Inn, the main character is tasked with solving the trials awaiting them in the town's dungeons.

Credits:

Artists

  • Carolynn Elo Vucic
  • Mackenzie Miller
  • Rebecca Pettigrew

Audio

  • Liam Sims

Designers

  • Adriel Aviles
  • Christian Hall
  • Javin Staton
  • Philip Salas
  • Raphael Pinheiro
  • Trai Hayslip

Special Thanks
